name: Punk Runner (PunkRunner)
description:
PUNK RUNNER

Punk Runner is an ambitious one button android platformer that challenges the player to face the constant danger of an urban hell!

Avoid the cyborgs that try to kill you and the several pits of fire. Don't forget to grab some cash, it still can be useful and above all, stay hydrated!

But you are not alone, our punky Punk Runner can always count on his buddy, the Punk Biker and his extra agility!

And you, would you dare to face hell?

The game is a side scroller, you only need to click to jump, your character do the rest!

This game has been created during a class at Isart Digital

We would like to thanks:

El Mow, Keanu, Corniaud, Maxou, Aude à la joie, Clemouille, OC, Mr & Ms Long/Short Legs, Monsieur de la Roche Bourguignonne, Vincent Dugenoux, Gigi, Valoche

Everyone we care for is mentionned 😘
